Test Case: Verify that all the fields such as Username, First Name, Last Name, Password and other fields have a valid placeholder
Test Step: 1. Check all the place holder from all the fields
Expected Result: There are should be place holder on every field

Test Case: Verify that all the required/mandatory fields are marked with *
Test Step: 1. Check the * on the mandatory field
Expected Result: There's should be * on the mandatory fields

Test Case: Verify that system generates a validation message when clicking on "Submit" button without filling all the mandatory fields
Test Step: 1. Click on "Submit" button without fill all the fields
Expected Result: An alert message should show up and the message is "This field is required"

Test Case: Verify that only filling the mandatory fields and not filling optional fields will still send data to the server
Test Step:
1. Fill in all the mandatory fields
2. Click on "Submit" button
Expected Result: The registration process will be succeeded

Test Case: Verify that filling all fields and clicking on "Submit"  button will send data to the server
Test Step:
1. Fill in all the fields including optional fields
2. Click on "Submit" button
Expected Result: The registration process will be succeeded

Test Case: Verify that system generates a validation message when entering existing email
Test Step:
1. Fill in all the fields on the "Registration" Page
2. Fill in the email field with the existing email
3. Click on "Submit" button
Expected Result: An alert message should show up and the message is "This email is already exist"

Test Case: Verify that the character limit in all the fields (mainly username and password) based on business requirement
Test Step:
1. Fill in all the fields on the "Registration" Page
2. Fill in the password field with less than 6 characters
3. Click on "Submit" button
Expected Result: An alert message should show up and the message is "(based on requirement)"

Test Case: Verify that the validation of email field by entering incorrect email id
Test Step:
1. Fill in all the fields on the "Registration" Page
2. Fill in the email field with the incorrect email id
3. Click on "Submit" button
Expected Result: An alert message should show up and the message is "This email id is incorrect"

Test Case: Verify that the “Terms and Conditions” checkbox is unselected by default (Based on bussiness requirement)
Test Step: 1. Verify that the checkbox is unselected
Expected Result: The checkbox is unselected (based on requirement)

Test Case: Verify that the validation message is displayed when clicking on submit button without selecting “Terms and Conditions” checkbox
Test Step:
1. Fill in all the fields on the "Registration" Page
2. Click on "Submit" button without click the “Syarat dan Ketentuan” checkbox
Expected Result: An alert message should show up and the message is "(based on requirement)"

Test Case: Verify that the password is in encrypted form when it is entered
Test Step: 1. Verify that the password is encrypted

Test Case: Verify the password limit when entering the password less than minimum characters
Test Step: 1. Fill in the password field with less than minimum characters
Expected Result: An alert message should show up and the message is "(based on requirement)"

Test Case: Verify the password limit when entering the password greater than maximum characters
Test Step: 1. Fill in the password field with less than maximum characters
Expected Result: An alert message should show up and the message is "(based on requirement)"

Test Case: Verify the password's required rule when entering only numbers (I assume the rule has to have mixed characters)
Test Step: 1. Fill in the password field with only numbers
Expected Result: An alert message should show up and the message is "(based on requirement)"

Test Case: Verify if blank spaces are passed in mandatory fields.
Test Step: 1. Fill in the mandatory fields with space
Expected Result: The expected result will be based on requirement
